name: Matchstick Racer
description:
Matchstick Racer

Matchstick Racer is an arcade racer where you race as a Matchbox car through a Swedish pine forest. Try to get the best score you can!

The game was made in 5 days time as part of a game development course. The assignment was simply to create a racing game in some terrain, this is what I came up with.

Please give me your feedback on the look and feel of the game in the comment section. I would also like to hear your thoughts on what you think makes a good arcade racer. 

Credits to CC0 Textures for the amazing environment textures.
